title: paahi paramaathma
sahitya:
pAhi paramAtma satatam mAm



caraNam 1



 rAma sakala ripu bhIma muni manOddhAma tri-jagadAbdhi rAma

   

caraNam 2



 bhAgadEyakaA rOgyAkara su-vairAgya bhaktajana yOgya

   

caraNam 3



 rAmacandra nI nAmamandu nija prEmalEni bratukEmi

   

caraNam 4



 santatambu tana antarambuna nI cinta lEni vADenta

   

caraNam 5



 dorakarAni nI caraNa bhakti Emarina mAnavuDa suruDai

   

caraNam 6



 Aru shatrulanu dUru cEsi nanu gAravincu vAru lEru

   

caraNam 7



 manasuna nokaTi vacanamuna vEra vinayamu lADukoninAnA

   

caraNam 8



 bAgugAnu shrI tyAgarAjanuta nAgarIka nanu vEga
